name: Yggdrasil (mahalis)
description:
Yggdrasil is a platforming game made for Train Jam 2019, in which you collect sunlight from the limbs of an enormous tree to help a small vine grow up it. The vine follows the entirety of the path you take on your way to collect bits of sunlight, which we think lines up nicely with the “Circuitous” theme of the jam.

Controls

  • Keyboard/mouse: WASD to move, mouse to look, Space to jump, Shift to dash once you unlock dashing
  • Controller: left joystick to move, right joystick to look, bottom face button (A / X depending on your controller) to jump, either trigger to dash once you unlock dashing

Credits

  • Nee Banglawawa: programming
  • Nich Thomas: level design
  • Noah Witherspoon: art and programming
  • Ali Cedroni: sound
